name: Stick With Me
author: Raymund Edgar S. Alvarez

sections.description:
Simple configuration for making your elements sticky? Fortunately, this plugin offers the features you want!

If you have any suggestions/comments, please let me know. Your opinions are highly appreciated.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘sticky-element’ directory to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
• Q1. What is z-index?
  • A1. The z-index property specifies the stack order of an element. The higher the value, the higher the chance your element will appear in top (or front) of all the elements
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Added “Space between top of page and sticky element” feature
  • Changed some fields as numericupdown

1.0.0

  • First public release
  • Added z-index feature

short_description: Make elements sticky on the top of the page (modified version of Sticky Element plugin by Heckenberg).
description:
Simple configuration for making your elements sticky? Fortunately, this plugin offers the features you want!

If you have any suggestions/comments, please let me know. Your opinions are highly appreciated.
